pageContext.claim: “So if we talk about certain subjects that you've been watching over the last six months, all of a sudden they were getting clobbered, so they went tone, stone cold silent. Big tech, the fake news media, they go silent anymore. They don't talk about it and that is the beginning of communism. That's exactly what happens. Because I think they hate our country, and they despise Georgia values, and I think a lot of you despise them.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump accuses the news media of hating the United States because they would not report without skepticism the false claims he made in the waning stages of the campaign or his allegations of election fraud.
